tool_description: Find Proof of Delivery from the image - TESTING
name: POD finder
title: POD finder

api_list.name: Request_Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/req_details/string"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/req_details/{req_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pod-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
